title: Draft Pick for Normals in OCE?
body: Is OCE ever gonna get Draft Pick for Normal games? Or are we being forgotten about again?

replies.body: The plan is the new champion select will roll out in normals eventually, once everything has settled down with ranked and solo q is rolled out. No timeline yet though.

What **Seras** has said is 100% correct as of right now. Here's some official proof incase you wanted that too though.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=Mc1nPqMw,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-01-08T00:37:19.107+0000)
>
> 
> This means that the plan to have Normal Draft enabled for a short time to test the new champ select is no longer necessary. It is coming to Ranked soon and the plan is for it to replace Blind Pick sometime in the future.

Link to whole quote is [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon?comment=00010001).

Whenever you want to know when something is coming out, just read the official Riot media release they use everytime.

> Soonâ„¢
